name: ATTESTATION
title: ATTESTATION

element.short: Record an attestation of a party (the committer) to item(s) of record content.

constraint.human: Reason valid must satisfy conditional constraints

element.short: Optional visual representation of content attested e.
element.definition: Optional visual representation of content attested e.g. screen image.

element.short: Items attested, expressed as fully qualified runtime paths to the items in question.
element.definition: Items attested, expressed as fully qualified runtime paths to the items in question. Although not recommended, these may include fine-grained items which have been attested in some other system. Otherwise it is assumed to be for the entire VERSION with which it is associated.
Reason of this attestation. Optionally coded by the openEHR Terminology group  attestation reason ; includes values like  authorisation ,  witness  etc.

element.short: True if this attestation is outstanding; False means it has been completed.
element.definition: True if this attestation is outstanding; False means it has been completed.
